        Composes a mail message.
        Parameters:
        from - email address
        to - email addresses
        cc - email addresses
        bcc - email addresses
        subject - of the message
        htmlMessage - text of the HTML message
        plainMessage - text of the plain text message
        attachments - the mail attachments
        category - the mail message category
        ec - editing context to create the mail message in.
        Returns:
        created mail message for the given parameters
